title: Farming Simulator 13
notes: Runs perfectly, to get around the black screen problem put in the "set launcher options" this: "PROTON_VARIABLE=1 nod3d11" so the game runs in DirectX 9 Mode and edit the game.xml to set the fullscreen mode to false

title: Farming Simulator 2013
notes: Set the launch options to "PROTON_VARIABLE=1 nod3d11" and edit the game.xml file to fullscreen = false

Runs perfectly. Had to use "PROTON_VARIABLE=1 nod3d11" as a launch option and set fullscreen to false in the game.xml. Without these two options launches to black screen and freezes up X-window when alt-tabbing.
title: Farming Simulator 2013 Titanium Edition
